remarks: Simplify the isomorphism of ~ cantnf to simple bijection.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2015.)
statement:
cantnff1o.1 $e |- S = dom ( A CNF B ) $.
cantnff1o.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. On ) $.
cantnff1o.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. On ) $.
cantnff1o $p |- ( ph -> ( A CNF B ) : S -1-1-onto-> ( A ^o B ) ) $.
